channel.title: Extra Stealth Suit
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Extra Stealth Suit" - Trade offer

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded:
Alright. I got the Shuriken. The Stealth Suit is yours Ananvil.

Sorry Schon, but that was the fairest way I could think to do it.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded:
Well Ananvil replied first about a 100 shuriken trade. If he can do that in the next, say, 2 days, then the stealth suit is his. If not, Schon can have it for the chakra armour.

I'll place the stealth suit in the storehouse now. So it'll be there for whomever can trade.

Just don't let anyone else take it, Uzuki.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded: Tomorrow I'll have the ability to put a chakra armor into the stash, it sells for 12500. Would you be willing to make a trade?

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded: If the leaders could facilitate the 100 shuriken trade, I'm totally for it.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded:
If I wasn't going to loop so soon, I'd buy something to trade for you to sell. =P

It'd be 100 Shurkien.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded:
I'd figured that those two couldn't be traded, but I wasn't sure. Ah wellâ€¦ I'll remove them from the list then.

Actually, I like Uzuki's system better. I'd rather him distribute items fairly, rather than giving it to whomever has the most valuble stuff to give in return.

Anyway, like I said, I'll hold onto it, so even if it takes you a while, once someone gets an item they can and want to trade, just let me know.

Also note that, should I happen to get any of the items on the list, they'll be removed from said list.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded: As a general rule, my intention is to take any monster drops I can trade and give them to whoever had the largest number of attacks on the kaiju if they didn't get the item already. I believe that using the monster drops to encourage village development is probably more important than my getting more permanent items :)

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded: Uzuki, you could summon a monster we've already fought and trade the monster drop to Lear for a Stealth Suit.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded: Referral items and the hollow leg can't be traded (it's impossible to get more than 1 of them). Wish I had something I could trade though, Stealth Suit is one of the items that I'm not rockin yet :(

item.title: Extra Stealth Suit
item.content:encoded:
Alright, long story made short, I got EXTREMELY lucky today playing the prize wheel. In my first two plays, I hit the grand prize TWICE, winning two stealth suits.
Since permanent items don't stack, I'm left with an effectively useless item, so that gives me three choices:

1.) Trade it to someone else for, ideally, an item that is equally rare and/or powerful.

2.) Be a nice guy, and just donate it to the village.

3.) Be a not-so-nice guy and sell it for my own profit.

I won't be doing number two. I'm nice, but not that nice, and I'm pretty much broke too, so the ryo from selling it is a nice incentive for number three. However, I'd hate to see such a rare item be used for the sole purpose of fattening my wallet, which is why I'm here.

If anyone is at all interested, and has any item that I would like, I'll offer a trade. I suppose this is similar to the "extra codec" thread that appeared a while back, but I'm not as nice of a guy as he was.

So anyway, my offer. I'm willing to trade my extra stealth suit for any of the following (though whether a trade would be beneficial from the other end is debatable on some of these):

Codec
Love Love Paradise
Any monster kill item
Sevens Trophy*
Any item that I could sell for 12,500 ryo or more.

*I don't even know if it's possible to drop these in the storehouse and thus trade, but if they are, then I'll take them in a trade.

Anyway, even if I don't get any response to this, I doubt I'll sell it. It's too rare of an item to do that, so even if no one wants to/can trade for another month or so, I'll probably still have the item. Just let me know if you're interested because otherwise, all I've got is dead weight.
